src:
Shopee Liga 1: Live Streaming Eksklusif Persija Jakarta vs Tira Persikabo
03 Nov 2019, 13:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persija Jakarta ditunggu duel sengit kontra Tira Persikabo pada pekan ke-26 Shopee Liga 1 2019, Minggu (3/11/2019) sore WIB. Pertandingan ini akan disiarkan langsung oleh Indosiar dan dapat disaksikan lewat layanan live streaming Vidio.
Persija Jakarta belum keluar dari situasi mengkhawatirkan di Liga 1 2019. Klub berstatus juara musim lalu itu masih berusaha untuk menjauhi zona merah lantaran hingga 23 pertandingan baru mengumpulkan 24 poin.
Situasi yang lebih buruk justru dialami Tira Persikabo. Klub asuhan Rahmad Darmawan itu sudah lama tak meraih kemenangan di Shopee Liga 1 2019.
Kemenangan terakhir yang diraih Osas Saha dkk. terjadi pada 19 Agustus 2019, ketika mengalahkan PSS Sleman dengan skor 3-1. Sejak saat itu, Tira Persikabo meraih lima kali imbang dan lima kali kalah.

Simak jadwal lengkap dan live streaming pertandingan tersebut di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Shopee Liga 1: Exclusive Live Streaming of Persija Jakarta vs Tira Persikabo
Nov 3 2019, 13:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persija Jakarta awaited a fierce duel against Tira Persikabo on the 26th week of Shopee Liga 1 2019, Sunday (11/3/2019) afternoon WIB. This match will be broadcast live by Indosiar and can be watched via Vidio live streaming service.
Persija Jakarta has not come out of a worrisome situation in League 1 2019. The club's championship status last season is still trying to stay away from the red zone because up to 23 new matches have collected 24 points.
A worse situation was experienced by Tira Persikabo. Rahmad Darmawan's club has not won a long time in Shopee Liga 1 2019.
The last victory achieved by Osas Saha et al. occurred on August 19, 2019, when they defeated PSS Sleman with a score of 3-1. Since then, Tira Persikabo has won five draws and lost five times.

Check out the full schedule and live streaming of the match below, Bolaneters!
